title: Del, Master of the Hidden Way

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Realm of Fantasy** â€” Manipulate reality each night, changing your goal to that of a player of your choice. That player is informed that you now win with them.
- Manipulate fate each night, redirecting a player to another player of your choice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All night abilities targetting you will fail.
- You may multitask.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Your goal is set to that of a random other player in the game at the beginning of the game, although that player is not informed of this.

desc:
Post 2018
*Everywhere, yet nowhere. His connections, his knowledge, his presence, his motives, his power-- All seem to be undefinable.*
Roleblock and redirect immune
